00035 #ifndef __included_core_exception_h
00036 #define __included_core_exception_h
00037 
00038 #    include "core_debug.h"
00039 
00040 namespace CrissCross
00041 {
00042     namespace Debug
00043     {
00044 
00046 
00050         class CoreException
00051         {
00052         protected:
00053 
00055             const char *m_file;
00056 
00058             int m_line;
00059         public:
00060 
00062 
00066             CoreException ( const char *_file, int _line ):m_file ( _file ),
00067                 m_line ( _line )
00068             {
00069                 g_stderr->WriteLine ( "=== STACK TRACE ===\n" );
00070                 PrintStackTrace ( g_stderr );
00071             };
00072 
00073             CoreException ( )
00074             {
00075                 g_stderr->WriteLine ( "=== STACK TRACE ===\n" );
00076                 PrintStackTrace ( g_stderr );
00077             };
00078 
00080             virtual ~CoreException ()
00081             {
00082             };
00083 
00085 
00088             const char *ShowFile ()
00089             {
00090                 return m_file;
00091             };
00092 
00094             int ShowLine ()
00095             {
00096                 return m_line;
00097             };
00098 
00100 
00105             virtual const char *ShowReason () const
00106             {
00107                 return "A core exception has occurred.";
00108             };
00109         };
00110 
00112         class AssertionFailureException : public CoreException
00113         {
00114         public:
00116 
00120             AssertionFailureException ( const char *_file,
00121                                         int _line ):CoreException ( _file, _line )
00122             {
00123             };
00124 
00126 
00129             const char *ShowReason () const
00130             {
00131                 return "Assertion failure.";
00132             };
00133         };
00134 
00136 
00139         class InvalidCallException : public CoreException
00140         {
00141         public:
00143             InvalidCallException ()
00144                 : CoreException()
00145             {
00146                 m_file = "N/A";
00147                 m_line = 0;
00148             };
00149 
00151 
00154             const char *ShowReason () const
00155             {
00156                 return "Invalid function call.";
00157             };
00158         };
00159     }
00160 }
00161 #endif
